oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch - 1948-06-13 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch, originally broadcast 1948-06-13 (part 1) over the CBS network. Featuring Gene Autry, Johnny Bond, Pat Buttram, the Cass County Boys, the Pinafores, Carl Cotner, with announcer John "Junior" Jacobs. Sponsored by Wrigley's Gum.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gene Autry; Cass County Boys; Pinafores; Carl Cotner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Back In The Saddle Again) -- Opening statement (John Jacobs) -- (There's Nothing Like A) Good Old Fashioned Hoedown (Gene Autry) -- Wrigley's Gum commercial (John Jacobs, Gene Autry)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Autry, Gene, 1907-1998; Gene Autry's Melody Ranch (Radio program); Cass County Boys (Musical group); Bond, Johnny, 1915-1978; Buttram, Pat; Pinafores (Musical group); Cotner, Carl; Jacobs, John; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.);
